inn1.comm: going straight on from a length outside off, left alone
some carry now for Shafiul outside off, holding its line a tad, left alone again
fullish delivery drawing him forward and across, pushed away to point
goes on with the angle on to the pads, and he shuffles to tuck it away to long leg
good delivery, holding its line outside off after being angled in on a length, left  alone right away
too wide outside off to make him play, lets it go easily
nippy length delivery first up, hitting him hard on the bat as he shuffles outside his stumps on the off and defends
bowled full and moving away outside off, too far away to lure him

big shout for lbw, this is good bowling, the one angled in from wide of the crease, Taylor's front foot was plonked forward and he cannot get bat down in time, is struck on the pad with part of leg stump visible, still too much doubt with the angle, looked like going down leg
blocked solidly down the track from around middle and leg
this one comes in from well outside off stump, he gets across, and lets it past
hurrying him in to a firm push towards mid on off the back foot, good opening over from Nazmul
Taylor pushes away from the body, pitched up ball, he stretches towards it but hits it straight to extra cover
testing delivery coming in a bit with the angle, he shoulders arms and lets it go past
again he is not quite moving his feet but reaches out to a widish one to push in the gap between cover and point
well done, solidly forward, opening the face late and picking up a single to third man
shuffles across, gets behind the line of a length ball angled in, and blocks
touch shortish to hurry him, he is able to defend off the back foot, there hasn't been too much movement so far
tries to carve a back of a length ball through covers but hits it in to the ground and it rolls away on the off side
homes in around off from a length, he is deep in the crease and carefully plays it on the leg side
pitched further up, he is hurrying them in to these defensive pushes, Sibanda gets forward and blocks back to the bowler

Sibanda uses his feet against the fast bowler now, he has done that so well against the spinners, walks a couple of steps down the track, and uses the angle on the length ball to work it past midwicket
getting well forward and pushes a fullish one past the non-striker, good diving stop at mid on saves some runs
bit of an inside edge as he gets forward to block one angled in
short of a length and getting up outside off, he punches forcefully but straight to mid off
comes in with the angle, he watches it closely and lets it go outside off
there is no one at gully, Sibanda gets a thick edge as he goes for the drive to a full delivery, and third man fields, would have gone straight to gully
stays beside the line and pushes out a length ball towards point with an open face
gets across and defends one that comes in around off stump
pushed back to the bowler off the back foot
smack! that is driven solidly off the front foot, pitched up delivery and he goes after it, cover is on the edge of the circle and fields
he has bowled well, close to off stump on a fullish length, he shoulders arms in the end
comes walking down the track, Nazmul bowls it a bit shorter and he has to push it towards covers
comes in after pitching, but not full enough to draw him forward, he is content pushing off the back foot
well bowled, opened him up a touch, it was hurled in with the angle, he shaped up to work it down the ground but had to adjust to defend on the off side as it bounced extra
fine shot from Sibanda, he has been in superb touch, gets one in the slot, slightly back of a length, and puts it through extra cover off the back foot immediately
there is TAylor going down on a knee, and cracking the whiplash cut with fast hands, straight to point
crouches and squeezes a length ball towards point
Taylor has thrown it away, shortish and wide outside off stump, he could have easily left it alone, went hard at it without much foot movement from the crease, and the edge flew straight to slip
Shafiul finds some more zip after that wicket, holding its line after coming in outside off, left alone
even better, hurled in fullish on the stumps, he gets forward and manages to keep it out with bat and pad close together
front foot is already out, he has to adjust to defend a short of a length ball angled in
inside edge on to pad this time, he is a touch late in getting forward, Nazmul has kept hurrying them all morning
walks down the track, even before the bower has reached the crease, he sees that and bangs it in short, Sibanda swings it down to long leg
shuffles and pushes a shortish one back to the bowler as it comes in with the angle
tries to get some runs, there have been very few loose deliveries, he stays back and whips a back of a length ball, straight to midwicket
again not full enough and not short enough, in-between length, hard to put away without any width, pushed away on the leg side
hits the bat hard from just back of a length as he defends on the off side
tries to use the angle on this one on the pads but cannot get it past square leg
slower one floated up outside off, he does not go after it and Rahim takes it on the bounce
goes for the blockhole, gets it very full and he squeezes out the drive to mid off
well run, gets forward and drops a full delivery in front of mid on, and they go through quickly for the single
another single, they need more of this, whipped in front of square leg and they are through by the time midwicket gets there
walks down the track, and gets this one away, Shafiul drops it short, and he swings it hard over square leg, he seems to be in control when he does his walking routine, Sibanda, nothing desperate
uses the angle to work a length ball from middle but straight to midwicket
slower one gone totally wrong, way down the leg side, he tries to bend the knee and reach out to sweep it around the corner, cannot get to it
again he skips down the track and pushes firmly with all that momentum, bowler does well to get a hand out and stop it
head on top of the length ball as he gets forward and across and blocks towards cover
walks down the track, they are doing it a bit too much now, takes it on the pads as he misses the attempted whip over the leg side
pushes back down the track from the crease
allows it to come on from outside off and has bat close to body as he pushes on the off side

another fine shot from Sibanda, uses the angle on the short ball, is some way outside the crease again as he swivels to pull it over square leg, there are two men in the deep but he has got it well in the gap
Shafiul gets it in the blockhole now outside off stump, dug away to point
stays on the back foot and punches solidly, shot of a man in form, cannot beat the off side infield
he will get this one through, too much width from back of a length, and Sibanda cracks it through cover from the crease
played out on the leg side with the angle
bowled fullish and slower, he is right forward and defends firmly on the off side
slung from wide of the crease around fullish on middle and leg, good delivery first up, he whips it towards mid on from close to the pad
just trying to stand in the crease and force a length ball through extra cover, nothing shot and he is fortunate not to edge it
better, he gets off strike as Rubel gives him some width to steer to third man

edge but goes just over the keeper, short ball moving away from the batsman who stood in the crease to play the pull from well outside off stump, outside edge flew over Rahim who got a glove to it as he leaped but it went over him
short ball, he gets back and punches it to cover
comes forward and forces the ball to midwicket
shuffles and presses forward to push down the track, but Shafiul stops it in his followthrough and forces the non-striker back in his crease
he has got himself in a position where he feels he has to go after them now, charges down and tries to swing him down the ground, is nowhere to the line of the ball angled in
defended down the track
now he tries to make room and carve him through the off side, beaten again, he is going nowhere, would be better off getting off strike with a single
opens the face off a slower one, there is no slip, it would have bounced in front of him anyways, and Masakadza picks up some much-needed runs
adjusts to whip a length ball coming in to midwicket

they have got the big one, they haven't given anything away today, Sibanda goes for the pull, is in no position as the short ball gets big on him outside off, and the edge comes down on the off side, Kayes reaches to it and finds Shakib settling under the ball, but manages to hold on and then stares at Shakib
Rubel gets it to bounce from a length and beats Taibu right away outside off, he has a feel for it away from his body
left alone outside off stump, Rubel bowling a tight length
makes him play with one fired in on the stumps, blocked down the track
takes it on the body as he shuffles to try and work a back of a length ball square on the leg side, misses
pushed with an open face towards covers for a single
played out cautiously with an open face towards point from the crease
bowls it in to the pads, Taibu cannot get it past midwicket with an awkward work
pacy delivery angled in and worked straight to midwicket
eases forward to defend a length ball coming in from wide of the crease, Bangladesh have been at them all morning
touch short, and sitting up outside off, he shuffles and defends
gets forward to block a fullish ball around off, end of another tight over
hangs the bat at an angle and guides one climbing outside off down to third man
fullish delivery fired in around middle and off, pushed away to mid on
hitting the bat hard from a length as Taibu defends on the off side, not many free runs today from Bangladesh, Zimbabwe will have to earn them
tries to shuffle across and work with the angle, gets it to square leg
good stop from the bowler, Taibu went forward and pushed a full delivery in the air, Rubel got down quickly to his left as it came back and fielded, neat effort
now he goes past the edge, as Taibu shuffles in the crease and ends up prodding at one back of a length outside off
punches off the back foot but there is a man at short extra cover
tries to stay beside the line and guide a length ball past point, gets it straight to him
still can't get the single, pushes forcefully down to mid on
he stands a long way outside off now, and he opens the face to run a length ball to third man
Taibu walks down the track now, he drops it a touch short, and Taibu has to defend it on the off side
another one finds the fielder, Taibu looks to get a back of a length ball past point but cannot beat the man there
Masakadza is not going anywhere at the moment, he tries to walk down the track and across to play towards midwicket, but the bowler follows him and he has to play it out on the off side in the end
gets the single this time, stands outside off and whips from there to long leg

Taibu goes looking for the single, and gets it, takes a step out of the crease, hops to keep the shortish one down in front of midwicket and comes scampering down the track, Masakadza lumbers across and gets to the other end safely
wide delivery there to be put away, he arches back for the cut but finds point, well then
gets outside the line a touch and swings at a shortish one, gets it backward of square leg
making him get on his toes with some bounce, he drops it in the air on the off side
back of a length around off, pushed down the track
another short of a length ball forced off the back foot down towards long on
steady tight stuff so far, shortish on the stumps, defended off the back foot
another shortish one, Taibu makes a lot of room and swings hard, gets it in the air, but mid on cannot get to it with a lunging dive
Taibu is targetting the part--timer, again he makes room, goes off side this time, gets around it and smacks it cross-batted past extra cover
pushed away off the back foot
short, wide, sitting up, he arches back and thumps it wide of sweeper cover
Taibu makes room again, bends the knee and has a heave, the fullish one was headed for middle, he gets a lucky inside edge fine on the leg side
more caution this time, in the crease and defending a length ball on the off side
well played, allows a widish one to come on and opens the face to run it to third man
short ball rising high outside off, he thought about having a go at it but then dropped the wrists and allowed it to go past
Masakadza is struggling to put the loose ones away, short and wide outside off stump, he tries to ride the bounce and punch it through covers, but is beaten
chopped from the crease wide of point
Masakadza's latest attempt at innovation comes off, walks outside the off stump, and whips a length ball in the air backward of square leg, fine leg is up and he gets the boundary
whoa, he lets the yorker rip, outside off, Masakadza hurriedly jams the bat down on it
dropped, at short extra cover, Taibu gets a life, he went pushing a length ball in the air, it went straight to short extra cover, where it popped out of Hom's hands
pushed away on the off side
outside edge, but there is no slip, and Taibu gets a boundary as he looks to force a pitched up delivery outside off
whipped with the turn from back of a length towards deep midwicket

excellent stop at deep midwicket, he has saved a certain boundary, it was short, flat, angled in, deserved to be put away, he had cracked the pull to the right of the man in the deep who ran to his right and dived to pick up the ball with one hand
pushed through fullish and he gets an edge as he tries to play it on the leg side, rolls away towards short third man
playing for the turn, there is not much, he is pushing them through, goes towards point
low full toss around middle, he bends the knee and sweep past a diving square leg
slows it down a bit around off, he pushes it down the track off the front foot
and he goes for a reverse dab right away, flattish one angled in around middle and off, he gets down on the knee early, allows the ball to come on and gets it past short third man, mighty effective
short, too short, not getting up much, rolls his wrists over the pull to get it along the ground  to deep midwicket
another short ball, busy Taibu crouches to swing the pull through square leg
slows it down and he pushes down the track
goes for the forcing sweep, cannot connect well, gets it over the keeper
goes deep in the crease to nudge on the leg side, Shakib too short in his opening over
full delivery, he drives hard down to long off
goes at a length ball with a straight bat and gets it towards long off
tries to work with the turn on the leg side, straight to square leg
bowled fuller and slowly turning in, pushed back off the front foot
gets down the track, outside the line, and lifts him over midwicket with the turn
tries the reverse dab again, but cannot get it past short third man
short, and angled wide down leg, Taibu swivels to swing it wide of short fine leg and gets the boundary as deep square leg cannot get to it, very poor from the captain
better from Shakib, tossed it up around middle and leg, Taibu makes some room and cracks the drive to long off
fuller delivery, eased down to long on
slows it down as he flights outside off, Taibu gets an inside edge as he goes pushing at it
walks down the track and tries to nudge past midwicket, cannot gets it beyond him and has to get back in time
short and turning away, he goes back and cuts hard to sweeper cover
goes down for the switch hit, but he bowls it wide down leg, not called a wide ultimately as the batsman had changed the grip
pushed back down the track
goes for the conventional sweep now, but there is square leg in place
tucks him up with one hurrying on around middle and leg, he cannot nudge it past midwicket
makes room and cuts from off stump wide of extra cover
whips from deep in the crease, deep midwicket gets quickly to the ball to prevent the second
tossed up full around off, driven with the turn to long on
going straight on outside off, he backs away and dabs it past short third man who fumbles a bit before throwing it back
defended back to the bowler off the front foot
down the track, takes it on the full and gets it to long on
Masakadza brings up the 100 with a push off the front foot to long on
gets forward to nudge towards midwicket but cannot get the single
Rahim belts out a huge appeal for lbw, short and going straight in with the angle, he went back but missed the pull looked to be going down leg
played out to midwicket off the back foot
turning in from outside off, flighted too, he gets forward and defends
tries to make room outside leg, but he follows him with a flat delivery, and he can only push it away
now he bows it much fuller and Masakadza gets forward to nudge on the leg side
maiden over, well bowled, he kept him guessing with variations, this one was pushed through outside off, and he could only dab it away towards short third man
pushed away on the off side off the front foot
still cannot get the run, comes down the track, pushes with the turn straight to midwicket
tight ball right around middle and off, this is good stuff, defended off the front foot
this time he will get it away, pushed through quicker, but shortish and wide, Taibu quickly backs away and cuts past short third man
down the track and drives to long off, they think about a second but Shafiul gets to the ball in time
eased off the front foot to long on
that has crashed in to the boards beyond the deep backward square leg boundary, shortish and down the leg side, he bends the knee and swings it hard in the air and gets it all the way
pushed off the back foot to midwicket
pushed in the air, but too quickly past the diving bowler

dropped Taibu gets away again, he came down the track, and whipped a fullish one with the turn, it went high straight to midwicket, he hopped in the air, got his hands to it, but it popped out, Bangladesh really not helping themselves with the dropped chances
pushed back down the track
flat one pushed through, played out to midwicket off the back foot
pushed off the back foot towards midwicket
goes back and hits hard down to long off
backs away but cannot get the cut past point
swept from a fuller length towards square leg, could have been a single

dropped, pushed through quicker, and Taibu gets yet another life as Rahim puts down a thick outside edge, he had gone back to dab it away on the off side, it ran off the edge into RAhim's gloves, and out of them
defended off the front foot down the track
played out with the turn towards midwicket
goes forward and nudges it, but midwicket gets around to it
down the track to one full outside off, and drives down to long on

another outside edge, Taibu is living dangerously, well bowled, tossed up, he was lured forward for the drive, but the edge went wide of Rahim and fine on the off side, Mahmudullah can't believe his misfortune
nudges a quicker one on the leg side and they rush through for the single
slows it down and he plays it out in front of square leg
pushed back down the track off the front foot
the edges are going away from the fielders, he goes down for a sweep, but the top edge flies past short fine leg
keeps out a quicker one on the off side
makes room and goes for a loose drive outside off, beaten
nudged in front of square leg for a single
goes down very early on the knee for the reverse sweep, and gets the full delivery past short third man
steers to third man for a single
wide delivery, he rocks back and cuts straight to point
pitched up much fuller, he gets forward and pushes hard, to mid off
stays beside the line and drops it in front of point, and Taibu the livewire charges across for the single
and again, just pushes a fullish one softly in front of mid on, and comes scampering down the track
good short ball, dug in around off, he goes down quickly on a knee as it comes in with the angle
hangs the bat out and gets a widish one past point to bring up his 50, lots of chances, but it has brought Zimbabwe back, raises his bat to acknowledge the cheers
cracked off the back foot to sweeper cover
whoa, that didn't get up much, looked like a slower one, Taibu had lots of time as it sat up outside off, and crunched it past extra cover
they have run well, goes deep in the crease to a length ball coming in, and drops it in front of cover
goes forward and drives a length ball through covers, wide enough of the man in the deep to come back for the second
eases forward and pushes a fullish one towards mid off, will have to wait for his 50
gets on top of a bouncing one wide outside off and dabs it to third man

dances down the track, and hits a length ball past extra cover, not in control but he will get the single for his 50, he struggled at the start but to his credit he has dug in, also brings up the 100 stand
another wide ball cut hard but right to point
stays in the crease and dabs softly wide of point for the single
looks to force a length ball away, it is closer to off and he can only push it on the off side
Masakadza gets four now, full delivery slung in around middle and leg, and he lifts it with the angle, in to the gap between midwicket and mid on
nudged off the back foot with the turn past midwicket
straightish back of a length ball, he punches it back to the bowler
shortish, flat, on the pads, whipped through square leg
width outside off now, he goes back and plays the cut late wide of deep point, and comes scampering back for the second, makes it in time
tossed up slow outside off, he gets forward to the pitch and eases it past covers
driven to long off for another single
fullish length but outside off, Masakadza gets around to off stump line and taps towards point.
full and angling into the pads, Taibu works it to midwicket.
he's looking for the yorkers, and doing pretty well so far. Taibu can't do much with it as it angles in.
nicely played this time, Taibu skips across even as the yorker comes in and whips it beautifully through square leg for four.
that's the perfect line, full and angling in late towards the toes. Taibu plays it back tamely.
all said, a very good over this. Taibu gets another yorker and defends it to the off side.
angling in towards the pads, Masakadza works it to wide mid-on for a single.
yorker again, Bangladesh are working to a solid plan here. Taibu gets the bat down quickly to keep it out. Single to the leg side.
again tight line, nothing to be done with that, Taibu forces it down the ground for one.
yorker gone wrong. High full toss on the hips, Masakadza pulls it thouhgh he is caught by surprise. Borderline case for a no-ball for height that.
Taibu skips away, the bowler follows him and it goes down the leg side. Exception from Mushfiqur to stop it from running down to fine leg.
another yorker, on middle and off, Taibu taps it towards point for one.
another top-drawer yorker. Comes in late, and Masakadza can't do much but defend in hope. Inside edged to the leg side and Taibu scurries through.
full and angling in, the Powerplay is going Bangladesh's way here. Masa heaves it to the leg side for a single.
a rare offering of width outside off, Taibu cuts it away to point and they get a single
length goes wrong from Rubel, and Masa latches on with a heaved pull over midwicket. He can't find the gap though, and gets a single.
slower ball outside off, Taibu gyuides it through point for a single.
he's denying Masakadza any room at all outside off, and Rahim again does superbly to cut off the second.
stunning yorker, Taibu blocks and runs.
another one near the blockhole, he makes room to thump it down the ground, gets an inside edge on to pad
hit straight down the track and in to the non-striker's stumps, ricochets away
another yorker, this is superb stuff, he digs it out to the bowler
shuffles across outside off and tries to go down on the knee and lap him fine on the leg side, misses the one angled down leg, appeal for caught behind turned down
that will disappear, he gets one in the slot, has to get the yorker wrong some time, not full enough and Masakadza gets under it to send it soaring over wide long on
slower short delivery, he is surprised initially but then recovers to work it square on the leg side
searing yorker homing in on leg stump, he gets leg out of the way and brings the bat down in time, that one moved in late in the air as it was slung in from wide of the crease
fullish one around middle and leg, he shuffles to push it softly past the bowler
there goes Masakadza through midwicket again, uses the angle on the full delivery to hammer it past midwicket
got 'em, Rubel uproots the leg stump, full delivery slanted in, Masakadza makes room to go over the off side, misses the swing, and the Rubel hits, finally the stand has been broken
gets forward and across to push one going across him to mid off
that is a superb run from Taibu, Ervine was not going to go for it as he dabbed a rising delivery to the right of point, but Taibu willed him on and rocketed through to the danger end
gets down the track, but is hit on the pad as he gets too close to the pitch
wide delivery carved through point off the back foot, brings Taibu on strike
short and hurrying straight on, he goes back to guide it through point, and comes back for the second with ease
dabbed towards point for a single
pushed away on the off side
Ervine down the track now, and he gets maximum, to the pitch of a fullish one and lofting with the turn over extra cover, that has gone all the way, some timing that
tosses it up on middle and leg, he eases it down to long on
goes for the sweep on a bent knee, and it flies to the right of short fine leg
shortish one guided off the back foot through covers
Ervine is swinging at almost everything now, just a bit of air, and he tries to whack it down the ground, inside edge on to pad
gets a low full toss past the bowler
fine diving stop by long on, parries the ball to long off who is close by, Taibu had eased down the track and timed the straight drive well
down the track, not in control but gets the swing away wide of deep midwicket to bring up the 200, for the first time in this series
over extra cover this time, uses the feet, gets around one darted in and lifts it inside out
not much chance for short fine leg, he had walked across and cracked the sweep from leg stump, short fine leg dived to his right as it flew in the air but it was too quick

gone this time, Ervine abandons the crease again, but Mahmudullah drags it a touch short and angles it across slowly, he tries to drive through extra cover but is beaten by the turn, and Rahim has an easy stumping
nudged with the turn towards square leg, Rahim gets there and fires in a wild throw at the non-striker;s end
easy single, shortish and turning in, he works it towards square leg
darted in full and whipped down to long on
takes a flat delivery from middle stump and guides it in front of point
short but hurries in with the angle, pushes off the back foot towards extra cover
whoa, that is just hurled in very full and wide, even Rahim is surprised and lets it slip through
pushes for another single on the off side
forced off the back foot through covers
slower one on the stumps first up, he is surprised and survives with an inside edge on to pad

dropped how many have gone down today, simple take at deep midwicket, but the substitute Shuvo made a mess of it, ran too much to his left and then saw the ball going over his right shoulder, it was another slower one, and elton had tried to create some pace on his own by walking down the track and pulling in the air
low full toss clipped off the pads through midwicket, Taibu does what he has been doing all day, he zooms back for the second

and out of nowhere, they pull off a stunner, Taibu is gone, big wicket, it was a high full toss whipped away wide of long leg where Rubel made good ground, dived forward to take it low, and then went scrambling along the ground
bangs in the short ball wide of the batsman, he is surprised and does not go after it
in the blockhole,  squeezed away towards extra cover, can't do anything else with it
that has gone, Shakib serves it up full and wide, Elton gets to it and smashes it high over extra cover
swings hard off the front foot but finds extra cover
darted in to the pads on a length, worked towards long on, who is a touch slow in getting towards it, and they take the second as well
fired in full and very wide outside off stump, testing the umpire, but he gets away
down the track and lifted past midwicket for another couple
that has disappeared, Elton really hits them a long way when he can, touch short, angled in, sitting up, he rocks back very quickly and slams the pull well over deep midwicket
around the blockhole right away, but he manages to squeeze it down the ground
sprays it very wide outside the off stump
full toss outside off, he tries to get under it but smacks it straight towards long off
full delivery, he shuffles across and nudges it behind square leg to get off strike, well done

fine stop around deep square leg, it was a slower one sitting up around middle and leg, Elton had launched in to a violent pull, but the man in the deep ran hard to his right and dived to stop the ball, which had slowed down a touch
another cracking pull, Elton is ensuring Zimbabwe hurtle beyond that 250 mark, shortish one and he cracks it wide of the man in the deep at squre leg this time
takes the single to keep strike for the last over
and gets a wicket off a high full toss outside off, Elton cannot get under it as he swings hard, and for once a catch is taken, at long off
two in two for Shakib, darted in on a length with the angle from wide of the crease, straightening around off stump, and hitting him in front of off as he missed the sweep, given right away
slaps a shortish one straight to cover off the back foot and has to hurry back as the throw comes in
hit down to long on for a single, this is turning out to be a good last over for Bangladesh
gets this one away over midwicket, comes down the track, is away from the pitch but manages to swing it in to the gap
Zimbabwe get to that 250 mark with another couple of runs, Utseya hits straight down the ground, and they scamper back in time

inn2.comm: right on target straight away, length ball zipping around off stump and going through at a nice height to Taibu as the batsman shoulders arms
just a touch short of a length, around that off stump again, he pushes hard off the back foot to mid off
going straight on with the angle on the pads, and Tamim is away with a work towards midwicket
hit on the pads as he shuffles to try and work one off the leg stump, ball rolls towards square leg
there is the one that holds its line right on off stump, have to play at it, just a touch back of a length though and he is able to push it away with an open face
fires it in the blockhole, Tamim manages to push it firmly through Vitori's hands, the ball slows down and mid off dives across to stop it
bit of width first up with the angle across him, Tamim gets on top of it and crunches it past backward point, it us hauled back in close to the ropes
similar to the one that Tamim got, but just a touch fuller, and Kayes lets it go straight away
angled full and wide for the drive, he went hard after it and mistimed it to cover
eep, he darts it too much across the left-hander and the angle takes it too wide outside off
nice solid firm push off the front foot, Jarvis just focussing on getting the angle going across the left-hander, full delivery goes to mid off
hmm, this one came back in a shade after being angled from wide of the crease, Kayes went forward to have a push at it, and ended up being beaten as he played outside the line
going along with the angle on a length, but Kayes is wiser this time and allows it to go past
big straight followthrough as he pushes solidly off the front foot to wide mid off, Vitori on that good length close to off
coming in with the angle around off, he punches it towards mid on and takes on the man with a sharp single, well done
straightish one on a length outside off, he is well forward and blocks it solidly
there is no gully, Sibanda got away early on like this as well, he has him driving at a pitched up delivery, and the ball flies past the slip cordon off the thick edge and even beats third man's dive
blocked off the back foot back to the bowler
bowls it fuller but bends it down leg with the angle
targetting the stumps with a full length, but Kayes is behind it and pushes towards mid on
Jarvis is giving a bit of width as he bends the ball across the left-hander from back of a length, and he punches on the up to the right of mid off
well run, dropped in front of extra cover and they quickly get across
fine leave, Jarvis gets some lift from a length, and a bit of inward movement too, left alone watchfully
slight width outside off and he goes after it hard, but mistimes the shot to cover
tries the shortish one in the body, he goes on a leg to swat it in front of square leg
thick edge as he goes for a drive outside off, but the ball goes along the ground to third man
Vitori with the yorker on middle and off, Kayes manages to jam the bat down in time
going on with the angle on the pads, helped away to long leg, there hasn't been the same sort of zip about Vitori today
in to the pads again from Vitori, he gets bat in front of pad and works it through the vacant midwicket region, Mpofu gets to it from mid on
gets him to drive outside the off stump from a length, straight to covers
straightening around middle from back of a length, eased back towards the bowler
well done, gets right forward and pushes firmly in front of mid off, and takes off for the single straight away
there are two men around point, and Tamim;s forcing cut cannot beat one of them as he latches on to a shortish one outside off
width from a full length for the drive, Jarvis gets away as Tamim crunches it straight to cover
this time he lets a slanted delivery close to off stump go past
back of a length on the pads, swatted through square leg for a single
beaten outside off as he goes for a drive on the up to one leaving him with the angle
and again, floated up very full and wide for the drive, he goes after it but cannot connect
pushed away on the off side from a length
shot! not much width, but he creates some by arching back  and slashing furiously past backward point to third man
punched away in to the off side but not much power on the shot and extra cover fields
nothing as far as width is concerned this time and he pushes it away down the track
tries to shuffle and work towards midwicket but cannot get it away
works it away this time towards square leg and has to get back quickly as the throw comes in
straightish one around the pads from a length, he bends low to work it towards midwicket
outside edge, but it falls short of wide second slip as he dives to his right, it was going across him and he pushed at it from the crease
gets on top of the shortish one and swats it backward of square leg, this is not a bad start at all from Bangladesh
gets across and pushes one leaving him towards covers
a touch slower from Jarvis, Kayes calmly pats it away towards extra cover
looks to swivel and thump it through midwicket, but it just zips past him from back of a length
shot! that has just raced past mid off, Tamim on the up from the crease, not much foot movement, just plonks front foot out and swings through one bouncing from a length, how's that for timing?
another well-timed shot, not much width, but he doesn't need any, cracks the cut past point and third man has to run hard and dive to prevent the boundary
worked away towards midwicket for the single
Kayes tries the on-the-up dismissive shot through extra cover, arches back and tries to carve it away, but is beaten by the lift on that one
Mpofu right on target, he plays it out quietly on the leg side
tucking him up from short of a length, and he keeps it down close to the crease
and he uses the angle in to him to work the single through square leg
width outside off stump, Jarvis has provided that often, steered away to third man
goes for the pull as Jarvis tests him with the incoming bouncer, top edge flies over short fine leg and wide of deep square leg, he gets away with a couple
full but on the pads, he crouches to clip it in front of square leg, Elton gets to it quickly to keep them to one
close to off stump on a length, he gets behind it to defend
pushed off the back foot straight to short extra cover

crack! he gets some width outside off and drives it instantly in the gap at extra cover, again not much foot movement, but he can do without that if he can middle them like this, teases mid off all the way to the boundary
on the pads, clipped behind square leg for a single
too full, too wide, poor delivery, he gets forward, throws his bat at it, and cracks it over covers
slower one but on the pads and nudged through square leg
bangs in the short ball in to the batsman, who gets on one leg and on top of the bounce to pull through square leg
going across him on a length, dabbed away to third man
tossed up full and he pushes it towards extra cover, wants the run but is rightly sent back
pushed towards point off the back foot
full delivery turned off the pads to backward square leg
shout for lbw from Taibu, he went well forward and Utseya slid it straight in to strike him on the pad, not given, would that have gone down leg?

doesn't matter, he gets him this time, umpire Dharmasena has no doubts now, flighted delivery, straightening, again he pushes outside the line for the turn, there isn't much, struck on the pad in front of leg, and Zimbabwe celebrate
fired in full around middle and leg, turned away in front of square leg
fired in around off stump from wide of the crease, defended carefully
defended on the leg side
uses the angle from round the stumps to work it through square leg
outside edge as he goes poking outside off but there is only one wide slip and it flies wide past him to the third man boundary
superb delivery, Mpofu gets it to zip away from back of a length, he ends up pushing inside the line to get beaten
gets behind a shortish one to push towards point off the back foot
tossed up ball driven down to wide long off
flighted around middle and straightening, defended off the front foot
gets forward to a pitched up ball and drives with the turn to long off
pushed solidly off the front foot to extra cover
plays a length ball from the crease and is hurried in to a defensive jab as it rushes on
shortish but he cannot put it away, rocks back and cuts straight to cover
pushed off the back foot towards cover from a length
opens him up with one leaving him around off stump, he adjusts to push it down the track
pushed away towards point
slants it in from wide of the crease, he gets well forward and pushes hard to wide mid off for the single
shuffles across and plays out a back of a length ball towards extra cover
tries to force a length ball on the off side, gets it to covers
almost chopped on, backs away to a full delivery, and tries to cut it away, goes past the off stump
gets forward and nudges in front of square leg, non-striker has to hurry back
gets down the track, and goes for the lofted shot, gets it down to long off
slapped off the back foot towards extra cover
gets forward to a tossed up ball and eases it to long off
backs away again and tries to cut a length ball, gets it towards point
pushed from the crease towards covers, Bangladesh have been tied down after Kayes went, which is surprising considering he wasn't really firing along
forced away towards long on
bangs in the short ball, he goes down even as it flies over him, Taibu takes it high up
cannot get away another one, forces it towards point, pressure builds up
looks to hit out, not exactly in control but gets the length delivery way over the bowler, and in to the straight boundary
opens the face to run a length ball to third man
Utseya is celebrating, he has taken off for a run, he has got another one, tossed up delivery dipping full around leg stump, he goes for a push down the ground and hits it straight back to Utseya
tossed up outside off, he gets around it to whip down to long on
inside edge as he looks to push on the off side, ball rolls away towards midwicket
gets it away now, forward to a flighted one and pushes with the turn towards long off
shortish and turning in, he goes back but cannot get the cut past point
defended off the back foot
going straight on with the angle on the pads, clipped in front of square leg
pops up in the towards vacant short leg as he looks to shuffle across and work it on the leg side
tight length close to off stump, carrying along across him from short of a length, defended off the back foot
gets it to bend back in a tad from outside off, inside edge on the leg side as he defends with an angled bat
gets across to keep a rising back of a length ball down in front of covers
another one slanted across him, he goes across to block it on the off side
nippy length ball on the pads, he shuffles to work through square leg
forced off the back foot straight to mid off
straightish one, he gets around it to work towards midwicket, they take on the throw which misses and finds the long off boundary
too much on the pads, and nudged wide of long leg
short, wide, there are two men not far apart at point, but he gets on top of the bounce and cuts it superbly between those them
better from elton, darts it in on the stumps, played out towards midwicket
gets forward to one coming in full and clips straight to midwicket
tries to dab one from too close to the body, and gets it in to the ground towards the keeper
hurrying straight on from a length, Vitori hasn't got much movement today, Tamim plays it out to midwicket
gets on top of a short of a length ball, but it is too close to be cut and he forces it away to point
this time there is some width, but Tamim glides it straight to point
goes for the full one around middle and leg, he almost falls over but manages to tuck it towards square leg
on the pads from round the stumps and worked to deep square leg
now in to the right hander's pads from over the wicket, nudged down to long leg
reaches forward to drive a full delivery, straight to extra cover

Tamim almost takes Vitori out of action with a charge down the track, and a huge smack, it flies straight at him, cal that a chance if you will, but Vitori will be glad he managed to parry it away, past the umpire
pushed back down the track
cracked off the back foot to sweeper cover
length ball going across, blocked away off the front foot, he hasn't got the wickets, but hasn't given away much, good control
heading for middle and leg, he shuffles far across and nudges it on the leg side
pushed back down the track from the crease
good firm push from Rahim, gets well forward and across to one angled across, but finds extra cover
almost always he is around that off stump, he shuffles and defends on the leg side
still cannot bowl a maiden though, Rahim gets forward and squeezes a fullish one past extra cover
full delivery around the pads, worked away towards midwicket
another full delivery, outside off, driven along the ground to extra cover
that was in the air for some time as Tamim worked a length ball off the pads, it fell just short of a lunging midwicket though
Elton finds some pace from wide of the crease and hits Rahim high on the bat as he defends from the crease
on the pads yet again, he is struggling against the right-and-left combination, down to long leg for one
gets away with a shortish one wide outside off, Tamim slaps it straight to extra cover
mid off is slow in picking up the ball and having a shy at the stumps, Rahim is quick enough to get across after pushing a fullish one towards him

Mpofu does it for Zimbabwe, rips in the throw from deep square leg, they took on the fast bowler's throwing arm, and came second, the ball came in a nice height on the bounce to Taibu, who whipped off the bails before Tamim's gloves could find the crease with a despairing dive, he had dropped his bat midway intentionally, probably to pick up some pace, as he turned around for the second run after whipping one through square leg, what a waste of a wicket!
Shakib is greeted with a poinpoint yorker first up, right on middle, Shakib manages to jam the bat down just in time
looks to force a full delivery down the ground, gets it to mid on
slanted in but Shakib arches back to steer it wide of point
goes for the pull as Vitori bangs it in short on the leg stump, gets it down to long leg
full delivery outside off, he bends the knee and squeezes it to sweeper cover
has a go at one going across him full, but cannot beat short extra cover
that one has disappeared, Shakib takes Elton on, not that short at all but he just swung it from around off way over deep midwicket

is that another one? low full toss, Shakib pushes it back at the bowler off the lower part of the bat, Elton goes down quickly to his right to pouch it, but he has his doubts right away, and replays are not conclusive whether the catch is clean
width outside off stump, cracked off the back foot to point
Shakib is going for his shots, pulls a short delivery wide of long leg, and comes back along with his bat for the second safely
bowls it full around off stump,  RAhim gets forward to ease it towards mid on
length delivery around the off stump, he smothers it down the track
pushed away on the off side
the asking rate continue its upward climb as Rahim pushes in front of extra cover and takes off, but is sent back by shakib as the fielder gets to the ball
gets him to push in the air off the front foot, but wide of extra cover
can;t get the run, Mpofu gets it to bend back in after pitching outside off, he chops it close to the pitch
bowls it full targetting off with the angle, he presses forward to defend
just a bit of width outside off, he goes at it and chops it behind point
gets on top of the bounce and steers it to third man
another one chopped in to the ground as Shakib goes hard from the crease at one coming in from a length
gets in to a tangle as he tries to work it square with the angle, but it trickled off the pads on the off side, and about four men converge on the ball, they don't want to give the single
short and Shakib gets it away this time, latches on to it with a hungry pull and sends it past a diving Vitori who gets to it with a dive, but it eventually trickles in to the ropes
pushed off the back foot on the off side
just a bit short and Rahim swivels for the pull, they decide to come back for the second, had the throw not been wild, it could have been tight
pushed to covers off the back foot
bends it in with the angle on a length, he plays it out to midwicket
scoops a length delivery, does not get it right, and it rolls away towards deeo square leg
appeal for leg before as he gets one off the pads fine on the leg side, not given, looked to have pitched outside leg, given as runs as well
full delivery around middle stump, he shuffles to drive with a big followthrough towards mid on
smacks a full delivery straight down the ground, Jarvis gets a hand to it and it trickles towards midwicket
gets some width and slaps it away off an under-edge towards third man
slower one bowled full around off, he comes forward and defends with an inside edge on to pad, just rolls his hands over the seam
another full delivery around off stump, Rahim defends well this time
angled in full around middle and off, he pushes firmly straight to short midwicket
slapped off the back foot to covers
keeping it tight on a length around off, he cannot get it past midwicket
tries to push off the back foot, but there is no width to be had and it rolls away to extra cover
widish one this time, but he smacks it straight to long off
driven to midwicket off the front foot, again Masakadza is right on the stumps
well bowled, Masakadza with another tight over, just a pushed single to long on
gets the boundary off the first ball, goes down on a knee and takes it from outside off to slog it to the deep midwicket boundary
down the track now, but finds long off
short of the man at long off, Shakib charges down the track and lifts him over extra cover with the turn, drops short of the man running around from long off
Utseya gets the big wicket
scoops a fullish one from around off wide of long leg
pushed down the ground for a single
pushed towards point off the back foot
punched off the back foot and cover cannot prevent the single, past him to sweeper cover
pushes with an open face but runs it straight to cover
fired in full on the pads, trickles away towards square leg
fine shot, stays in the crease and cracks a shortish one past midwicket
width outside off now, he thumps it past point but sweeper keeps them to one
still more width outside off, but he punches straight to short extra cover
chance for a run out, but the throw was a touch far to Taibu's right, and bounced in front of him as they came back for the second off a pull backward of square leg
shot! crunched past extra cover on the up and he will get another boundary
shortish one, shuffles and whips past midwicket
goes languidly after a short and wide one, and gets it over point
unfurls a drive off the front foot that takes the fullish one past midwicket
pushed off the back foot to the bowler
he is batting freely, though there is a fine line between that and recklessness, drives away from the body, and gets it in the air to third man
length ball pushed away to extra cover
gets around a full delivery outside off and tucks it through square leg
down the track and eases a length ball down to long on
forced off the back foot down to long on
flat delivery outside off stump, backs away and cuts to deep point
slashes straight to short third man
another run out opportunity missed, played on the leg side and they go for the run, the throw is a touch late at the non-striker's and Utseya cannot collect properly as well
gets width outside off as it sits up from a length, punched straight to extra cover
Elton gets away with another wide ball, guides it right to point
shout for lbw as he looks to hammer a shortish one over midwicket, it comes in with the angle and he is struck high on the pad, could have gone down leg, pretty high too
pushed in front of point for a single, in the air for a while
nicely done, he flicks one off the pads through square leg and comes back for the second
gets the line right this time, full around off stump, he pushes it back to the bowler
down the track and eases a length ball with the turn to long on
another single down to long on, these two bringing Bangladesh back
turning in from outside off, cut behind point
works a tossed up ball towards square leg
gets down  the track and lofts with the turn, on the bounce to long on
swivels and pulls a flat and short ball straight to deep square leg
slapped off the back foot to sweeper cover
gets on top of a shortish ball and swings it down to long on, he seems to have a lot of time to play his shots
excellent stop at third man, it was slashed in the air but he got to it on the bounce with a scrambling run to his left, that is 50 for Rahim, who is coming to their rescue yet again
another single on the leg side, this stand continues to grow
now they push on for the second, he had cracked the pull wide of long on, saw the fielder getting slowly to the ball and came back for the second, well run
Rahim keeps the strike with another single
down the track but not to the pitch, has to push it on the off side in the end
worked off the back foot through square leg
Jarvis has saved a certain boundary, down the track and slammed hard in the air, it leaped towards the boundary off one bounce but Jarvis went flying to his right to slap the ball back in
fumble at midwicket allows another run
goes back to a shortish one and puts it away through extra cover
more runs, off the pads towards short fine leg, these two are looking in control

needless run out, absolutely needless, another waste of a wicket, running in to trouble is Hom, he has batted brilliantly on debut, but has given it away, punched off the back foot towards extra cover who gets to the ball quickly, Hom carries on running furiously towards Rahim who hasn't moved much apart from taking a couple of steps out, and Taibu has one of the easiest run-outs of his career
gets on top of a short ball and pulls it in to the ground towards midwicket
misfield at point allows the single off a cut
tight line from Mpofu, coming in with the angle on the stumps, he makes room to chop it towards point
almost another one, they are running mindlessly out there, pushes with an open face to backward point, who just has to lob the ball on to the stumps, he misses and Rahim, who has given up, survives
played in front of square leg
huge imploring shout from Utseya, he is not happy that umpire Dharmasena has turned it down, hit full on the pads as he got down for the reverse dab, was there a bit of bat on that?
that has flown straight at Utseya, it was slammed hard and Utseya got his head out of the way but took it on the right wrist, it almost lobbed on to the non-striker;s stumps
superb stroke from Rahim, down the track again, getting around a fuller one and going wide of extra cover, no chance for long off
goes hard at another full delivery, gets it down towards long on
reverse paddles a full one wide of short third man
goes down on a knee and gets the slog sweep away, flat delivery and he creams it past deep midwicket
gets across and eases a widish length ball to extra cover
width from vitori and Rahim cracks it way over point, sweeper cover puts in the dive, picks up the ball but slides with it in to the boundary
coming in with the angle, he stays in the crease and dabs it towards point
that has been smacked on the up, way above extra cover but slows down inside the boundary, Vitori getting some stick
almost another run out, squeezed to point, he comes forward and grabs at the ball, cannot pick it up, tries again, messes up again, and they take the single by that time
Rahim pulls out the scoop now, gets it fine on the leg side for another couple, what an innings from him
fired in fullish around leg and he chips it above midwicket, they come back for the second
goes for the full length on the stumps. he makes room to slam it to long off
another couple, Rahim tries to go straight down the ground with a big swing, mistimes it in the air but it falls short of long on
yet another couple, they are running hard, they are doing it, away towards deep square leg, they take on even Mpofu's arm, the throw is at Jarvis' end and Mahmudullah gets back
over the bowler's head from a full length, and Mahmudullah races back for the second
driven towards mid off, chance for the run out, but mid off does not throw, there is no one backing up,
bowls it in from wide of the crease, Rahim backs away for the cut, but is beaten by the angle and the pace
Rahim gets another one off the middle of the bat, Zimbabwe keep bowling it around a length, and RAhim keeps tonking them, over midwicket with the angle, just bounces inside the boundary
he betters himself, makes room as Vitori gets it very full for once, but Rahim manages to squeeze it in the air between short third man and backward point
low full toss fired in around off, he eases it past the bowler down the ground
there was width this time from a length, but Mahmudullah could not bat on to it as he reached out
Vitori gets a wicket, bangs it in short with the angle, he goes for the pull from outside off, and finds long on, still Bangladesh's game, but they keep shooting themselves in the foot
falls short of short midwicket, he looked to pull a rising shortish ball, it came slowly and he almost hit it straight to Taylor

he has found Taylor this time, it is rest of Bangladesh against Rahim, and the former is hanging in there, Nasir tries to smoke another short ball over midwicket, top edge swirls in the air and finds Taylor as it comes down
Mpofu bowls the slower one in to the batsman, he cannot get it past midwicket, non-striker has to get back in time
Rahim decides to do it alone, and that seems to be the right way, gets the pull wide enough of deep midwicket, immense composure under pressure
the yorker, he digs it out on the leg side and they scamper through without any issues
Mpofu hurls in another yorker, bat cannot get down in time, he finds the pad, looked to be going down leg, not given
Rahim is at the non-striker's end, he can only watch as Shafiul has a go at a widish length ball and misses

Jarvis has gone through Shafiul in fading light, Shafiul going for another heave, this time Jarvis was on target, Shafiul missed again, Jarvis found leg stump with a full length and roared, Rahim stood helpless
that is a classy looking cover drive off a full and widish one, there is a man there, but Rahim will get on strike
Rahim refuses to let it go away, his will is immense, his sight is working well in the dying light, and he whacks Jarvis' length ball way over the deep midwicket buundary
he moves to 99 with a slap towards extra cover, one ball left in the over

Jarvis roars again, this game has turned again, pinpoint yorker on the middle stump, too good delivery to get at any time, much too good in fading light, perfect against No 10, wood is uprooted and the crowd gets behind Jarvis
it is too dark at the ground, Rahim somehow slaps this fullish one past extra cover, and gets back for the second, maiden ODI hundred, he aint celebrating yet

Rahim cannot do it for Bangladesh, what a tragic end, one scoring shot away from glory, it was pitched up and he went for it, for the big one down the ground, but did not get enough on it, it swirled towards long on who grasped it in near-darkness, the crowd erupts, Zimbabwe have won the series, Mpofu has uprooted a stump and taken off
